testcase.name: Make sure server implements crud functionality for chest endpoint: 1: Verify that status code equals 201 when we create a new chest and the chest is returned 2: Verify that status code equals 303 and we get a redirect to an already existing item, when we create a new chest with a name that already exists 3: Check for status 404 if we try to get an chest with a wrong id 4: Get chest with id 5: Get a list of chests 6: Update chest 7: Check if a new chest is created when chest gets a new name and name does not already exists 8: Check for status 303 if we update chest to an already existing name 9: Check for status 404 if we update with a non existing id 10: Check for status 404 when trying to delete a non existent chest 11: Delete first created chest with id 12: Delete second created chest with id

Make sure server implements crud functionality for item endpoint: 1: Verify that status code equals 201 when we create a new item and the item is returned 2: Verify that status code equals 303 and we get a redirect to an already existing item, when we create a new item with a name that already exists 3: Check for status 404 if we try to get an item with a wrong id 4: Get item with id 5: Get a list of items 6: Update item 7: Check if a new item is created when item gets a new name and name does not already exists 8: Check for status 303 if we update item to an already existing name 9: Check for status 404 if we update with a non existing id 10: Check for status 404 when trying to delete a non existent item 11: Delete first created item with id 12: Delete second created item with id
